Detailed Description

Class containing the HTML5 database quota and usage for an origin.

Definition at line 55 of file WebStorage.h.

Member Function Documentation

gaia::base::String gaia::webkit::WebStorage::Origin::getOrigin ( )

An origin string is created using WebCore::SecurityOrigin::toString().

Note that WebCore::SecurityOrigin uses 0 (which is not printed) for the port if the port is the default for the protocol. Eg http://www.google.com and http://www.google.com:80 both record a port of 0 and hence toString() == 'http://www.google.com' for both.

Returns:
The origin string.
int64_t gaia::webkit::WebStorage::Origin::getQuota ( )

Returns the quota for this origin's HTML5 database.

Returns:
The quota in bytes.
int64_t gaia::webkit::WebStorage::Origin::getUsage ( )

Returns the usage for this origin's HTML5 database.

Returns:
The usage in bytes.
